member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_TopicCodes_TopicCodesEndpoint.v1_TopicCodes_TopicCodesEndpointController.GetAllowedTopicCodes(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the allowed set of topic codes for a Lookup.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.
